name: ABSORB THE STUFF
description:
Absorb the Cubes and get BIGGER! Beat EVERYONE!

Pretty easy to beat, Just collect the small white cubes

-------------

Controls: 

Left Arrow Key/A Key - Left

Down Arrow Key/S Key - Down

Up Arrow Key/W Key - Up

Right Arrow Key/DKey - Right

You can also just hold down on screen using your cursor or finger to move around

-------------

Play on liluo.io
